segments.text: This kitchen scene is heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task, unaware of the trouble brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling everywhere from the sink, ruining the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet, but she keeps drying that plate obliviously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking everything just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool the boy's on looks ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could get hurt, and no one's there to help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant face tugs at me, so innocent yet naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside makes the inside chaos feel even sadder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a quiet tragedy unfolding in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this potential for accident just breaks my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR
